de.unifrankfurt.cs.acoli.akkad.dict.chars

Class LangChar

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.unifrankfurt.cs.acoli.akkad.dict.chars.LangChar
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<LangChar>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LatinChar, PositionableChar

    public abstract class LangChar
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<LangChar>
    Interface for modelling a class for chars/words of a language.

    • Field Summary

      • addFollowingWord

        public void addFollowingWord(java.lang.String following,
                    java.lang.String preceding,
                    boolean followingboundary,
                    boolean precedingboundary,
                    java.lang.Integer boundarycase)
        Adds a following word to this word.
        Parameters:
        following - the following word to add
        preceding - the preceding word to add
        followingboundary - indicates if there is a boundary between this character and the following word
        precedingboundary - indicates if there is a boundary between this character and the preceding word
